title: GRIP
notes:
Doesn't launch - error message states "DX11 feature level 10.0 is required to run the engine."

Setting launch options to "PROTON_USE_WINED3D1=1 %command%" makes it launchable, but performance is very stuttery and there are quite a few graphical glitches (basically unplayable).

notes: Gameplay is fine with approximately 80% of native windows performance. But the music is very distorted, and audio volume controls do nothing.

title: GRIP: Combat Racing

notes: Game runs normally, except performance is unplayably-bad.
title: GRIP: Combat Racing

notes: If you're experiencing poor frame rates on Nvidia, try spoofing an AMD card to improve performance (https://www.reddit.com/r/SteamPlay/comments/9m18ck/troubleshooting_performance/). Applying this workaround took my frame rate from single digits to a solid 55-60 fps. Tried to install xact to fix audio issues, but it didn't seem to have any effect.
